release.action: IGE: Fix localization resources, also for partner profiles (HH).
Portal: Make iFrame Portlets editable by admin-portal user (WSV), new portal database version 3.4.1.
Portal: Fix SERVICE parameter of GetCapabilities in detail view (if not INSPIRE conform in CSW).
WebMapClient: Add coordinate toogle.
WebMapClient: Default definition of 'Active Service' panel.
WebMapClient: Add new color picker for redlining features.
WebMapClient: Drag map tool by using redling.
WebMapClient: Run client standalone.
WebMapClient: Remove downloadify (Flash) and used FileSaver (JS).
WebMapClient: Edit search message.
WebMapClient: Update welcome text.
WebMapClient: Redlining localization.
WebMapClient: Add favicon.
WebMapClient: Activate layers by using "Zeige Karte" function and defined layer identifier.
WebMapClient: Add capabilities Update-Checker.
WebMapClient: Add setting and function to send saved maps as mail.
WebMapClient: Add capabilities URL to metadata dialog.
IGE: Added behavior to automatically fill some fields when INSPIRE topic was chosen.
IGE: Added new relation type "Nutzungsbedingungen". Added relation type filter for table "references to".
IGE: Added a dialog to inform the user when copying a metadata. This dialog can be hidden by a checkbox by setting a cookie value.
IGE: Use Service-Url instead of getCapabilities-Url and append parameters automatically.
IGE: Check for invalid getCapabilities and possibility to replace them.
IGE: Updated all views to use labels of object classes from codelist repository.
IGE: GetCapabilities-Assistant extension.
IGE: Add checkbox to available additional field.
IGE: Add checkbox to available additional field.
WebMapClient: Save active service tree state into session.
WebMapClient: Add Identifier to metadata info dialog.
Portal: Define keywords to hide on detail view.
WebMapClient: Update frontend layout and UI.
WebMapClient: Update load saved services dialog.
WebMapClient: Remove permalink function.
WebMapClient: Closing the searcher info dialog does not show it anymore until clear browser cookie.
WebMapClient: Localization of Admin-GUI.
WebMapClient: Localization of message buttons. (Admin-GUI)
WebMapClient: Update Admin-GUI layout and configuration order.
WebMapClient: Get initial map projection from configuration parameter "projections".
WebMapClient: Get maxExtent from capabilities entry "BoundingBox".
WebMapClient: Update Admin-GUI to save copyright, baselayer, featureInfo URL with one button.
Portal: Update detail view to flexible order of content.
Portal: Update WebMapClient localization for portal profiles.
Portal: Update Sachsen profile.
Portal: Update Hamburg profile.
Portal: Update DLZ-IT profile.
IGE: Import: Fix import of CSW Resource-Identifier. More robust mapping of INSPIRE keywords to codelist entries.
WebMapClient: Fix outside definition of map extent at the admin-gui.
WebMapClient: Fix to move services on layer tree by icon.
WebMapClient: Fix feature info dialog height.
IGE: Fix url validation if a proxy has to be used on the installed system.
Reconfigure portal so protocol is preserved in all portal urls (keep https protocol in GeoPortal.WSV where secured frontend is used).
Fix sql scripts for oracle (installer).
IGE: Fix import of ISO data (converted IGE format had wrong version).
Profile SachsenPortalU: Fixed images and content.
Profile GeoPortal.WSV: Switched base url in header to HTTPS.
IGE: Added ATOM Url to catalog settings and checkbox to set metadata for ATOM download.
Profiles: Fixed typo on error page. Updated NUMIS facets definition. Removed webmap client configuration from profiles.
Portal: Fix reset facets if no search results.
Fixed SQL scripts for Oracle (now drop table before creation via PL/SQL).
WebMapClient: Support of non WGS-84 services as base layer.
WebMapClient: Get maxExtent from base layer.
WebMapClient: Split nominatim and minimap settings for viewer and searcher.
WebMapClient: Get title for feature info not depend on service "OnlineResource" tag.
WebMapClient: Restore selected layers from session.
IGE: Fixed wrong icons in dashboard for published objects.
IGE: Fixed UI problems introduced by new versions of firefox and chrome.
IGE: Mark table cells if they have empty rows (which should be deleted to prevent null-values in database).
IGE: Url for ATOM download service is not required anymore.
IGE: Fixed a bug where object-/address-tree could not be selected anymore.
IGE: If there are more than one use constraints in database, then they will be merged into one text field.
IGE: Added scripting and IDF mapping templates for profile of LGV HH.
IGE: Added "Open data" checkbox and Categories.
IGE: Added new additional field: "Checkbox".
IGE: When editing link and relation is "Download of data" then new input field "file format".
IGE: Added overview of published objects on user entry page (dashboard).
WebMapClient: Add Nominatim-Search to the frontend of the WebMapClient menu bar.
WebMapClient: Add configurations for other portal profiles.
Portal: Add Localization file to profiles for the InGrid-WebMapClient.
WebMapClient: Update content of Welcome Dialog.
Portal: Update GeoPortal.WSV profile: Localization issues. Hide info portlet on disclaimer page. Slideshow. MyPortal.
Portal: Update NUMIS profile for InGrid 3.3.
IGE: Update of help texts.
Portal: Fix fetching of RSS news when link differs although same news (e.g. due to changing ad-parameter in link).
Portal: Fix facet problem with providers when partner is selected.
Portal: Fix link to wemove page in content of Impressum.
IGE: fixed bug that save dialog appeared without reason.
IGE: Fixed a bug where IE8/9 could not inherit address data to its children.
IGE: Fix group administration when setting permissions to more than visible entries in table.
IGE: Fix display of import/export exception.
IGE: Paging of associated objects in an address working again.
IGE: Extended Search of objects in Research startup issue.
Portal: Switching to different profiles now also runs on Oracle.
Portal: Added missing oracle scripts for updating mdek database.
WebMapClient: Fix format of image in GetMap request, now dependent from content in GetCap.
WebMapClient: Fix decoding of response of GetFeatureInfo.
WebMapClient: Transformation coordinates to WGS-84 by search area.
IGE: Fixed scrolling of info dialog.
Portal: Show "XML"-Link on search result list only if the hit has an ID and if is a metadata.
WebMapClient: Add Servlet to load created WMS services outside of tomcat.
Add handling of new iPlug Type IPLUG_DSC_MAPCLIENT.
Update DWD Warnmodule flash file.
Portal: Update "baw_wsv" profile for facets, map integration, detail view and search result list.
WebMapClient: Add "fullmap" configuration for other portal profiles.
IGE: Increased speed when using IE8
Fixed sorting of columns in job overview.
WebmapClient: Zoom-To-Layer should now zoom to correct scale, where the layer can be actually seen.
MapClient: Add support for resizing tiles while zooming.
IGE: Codelist spatial references can have extra data now, which is interpreted as Bounding-Box-Parameters. These will be inserted automatically when a spatial reference is selected.
IGE: References and spatial references can be inherited from the parent object now.
IGE: Addresses within objects can now be copied and pasted.
IGE: By holding "Ctrl"-Key, you can select more than one node in the hierarchy tree. You can then copy, move and delete several objects/addresses at once.
IGE: Notes field has been removed from the address form. Previous data has been moved to the comments.
IGE: Address information can be inherited from the parent address now. It's also possible to save an address information to all sub-addresses via the context menu.
IGE: Addresses now have a field showing the publication condition.

IGE: Instead of printing one object/address, you also can print the whole sub-tree with all information or only the title, which is then shown in a hierarchical order. It's also possible to print search results now.
IGE: In the user administration a new tab shows the objects/address a user is responsible of.
IGE: In the group administration all users of a group can be seen now.
IGE: The import and export was extended to also handle working versions, which allows a full backup.
IGE: When checking for duplicates a link directs you to the object now, where it can be edited.
IGE: The dashboard also shows the last globally modified objects and addresses.
IGE: All objects can add a preview image, which is show in the search results and the detail view.
In Detail view: Map hierarchyLevel value 'tile' to 'Geoinformation/Karte'. Default to 'Geoinformation/Karte' for unknown hierarchyLevels.
An "XML"-Button next to a search result and within the detail information requests the CSW-interface to show the IDF-document.
Update GeoExt to Version 1.1 for IE9 print support in map client.
Update BAW-WSV Profile.
Create facet by configuration XML "facets-config.xml".
Update NUMIS profile/layout to InGrid Portal Version 3.2.
Added missing fixes to SQL skript to be executed manually when migrating from MySQL to Oracle.
Do not overwrite map client configuration if it already exists.
Fix problem with finding localization from profile resources introduced with GSSOIL code.
Further improve robustness of RSS fetcher using special timeout thread for RSS connections.
Fixed wrong handling of parameters when using getCapabilities assistant.
Do NOT render institution field in title of address search results for persons. Change order to firstname lastname.
When importing syslists manually reset timestamp for synchronisation with codelist repository. So all codelists are synchronized with repo to avoid loss of entries after manual import.
Change JDBC connection pooling properties in tomcat context files to avoid broken database connections.
MapClient: Fixed problem when loading an external service and enabling all layers (error tiles).
Catalogues: Fixed jumping to head, when reloading page on opening/closing node.
MapClient: fix problems searching for terms with special characters.
Update tomcat to apache-tomcat-6.0.35 (from apache-tomcat-5.5.26)
Update Dojo to version 1.5.2 to support IE9.
Map-Client: Fixed metadialog display of layer abstract.
Map-Client: Fixed epsg compare in add service method, we lowercase before comparison now.
Map-Client: Fixed bug in checked layers, works now with tree view.
Map-Client: Fixed settings dialog, it doesnt disappear on resizing panel anymore.
Map-Client: Fixed SRS check, checks now for SRS property in bbox aswell.
Map-Client: Fixed bug in search, we check results for consistency now
Portal: Fixed bug showing all results of an iplug which is shown on the right (unranked) side
IGE: Added coupling type for service objects.
IGE: Separated addresses of users to hidden addresses not visible in IGE. In user management no IGC address for user, instead direct input of user address data.

IGE: Separation from the portal now possible. If the IGE is installed without the portal then the user has to login on a separate page. An administrator can manage available users and all connected catalogues.
Add sql file for new page (data source) and new sub menus ("Catalog" and "About Portal"). Update headers images. Add new portlet for data sources.

Added access to a codelist repository, where all codelists are managed. These codelists are used inside the portal and the IGE frontend. Synchronization is done by a quartz job and written to the database (IGE) and XML-file (portal).
WEBMAP-CLIENT: Installer now installs the webmap-client as well.
IGE: Visualize publication condition and write permission in tree nodes. Add entity class and publication condition as tooltip. Change publication condition via context menue in tree.
IGE: Add checkbox "Do not display data" to address class "Person" for not showing address data in portal, CSW.
Portal: Add new IFrame portlets for BAW to display application overview with html pages. Add new sub menu (sub-menu-start) for BAW. Add new CMS portlet pages for BAW.
IGE: Add "Catalogue namespace" to "Catalogue settings" used when exporting data (CSW, Open Search). Add button for generating UUID for "Identifikator der Datenquelle".
Improve user manager performance. Add filter capabilities to user and provider manager. Use new pagination in portal administration tables. REQUIRES PORTAL DATABASE CHANGES. SEE UPDATE_3.2.0-XXX.SQL!
Add edit mode to iFrame Portlet to change default preferences like WIDTH, HEIGHT.
Add iFrame portlet to display external web services.

ingrid-portal-apps.properties: Add property "portal.rss.news.number" to define number of rss news on start page. Add properties to enable/disable displaying of cms item on admin content page. Add properties to enable/disable optional links on search portlet. Add properties to enable/disable datasource selection on search portlet. Update properties for PortalU.

BAW: Add new profile (baw_wsv) for BAW. Add CMS items key to "portal.teaser.shortcut" and "portal.teaser.shortcut.query" for BAW to define shortcut query and application access. Add application pages for BAW to display internal applications (with iFrame Portlet) inclusive application resources files.
PORTAL: Do not use feed date as fallback for RSS entries anymore. Entries without a valid date will be ignored.
Update DWD warn modul.
Update topic, measure and service page for NUMIS profile.
Update tomcat config. (manager.xml and tomcat-users.xml)
PORTAL: Changed portal database tables "ingrid_rss_source" and "ingrid_rss_store" by setting title, description and author to VARCHAR (1023).
IGE: Original object identifier now transfered from backend to show in detail/compare view.
IGE: Capabilities-Assistant, also add keywords when creating new object.
IGE: Allow free spatial references without coordinates if at least one spatial reference has bbox.
IGE: Changed process and popup dialog for adding/editing operations.
IGE: Changed process and popup dialog for adding/editing references (links).
NUMIS: Update NUMIS profile for InGrid 3.1.
GS Soil: Update properties at GS Soil portal profile.
Update dwd sources for weather portlet.
Portal: Updated Sql File changed TYPE to ENGINE, resolved compatibility issue in MySql in version 5.5.X
IGE: Allow empty value in selection "Zeichensatz des Datensatzes", initial value is empty.
IGE: Changed names of object address relations according to INSPIRE. Also change behaviour: only one referenced address necessary, no matter which reference type.

IGE: Move field "Geoinformation/Karte - Sachdaten/Attributinformation" next to "SchlÃ¼sselkatalog", on Input make "SchlÃ¼sselkatalog" mandatory. Add new control "Datensammlung/Datenbank - Objektartenkatalog" with same behaviour as "SchlÃ¼sselkatalog".

IGE: Move fields "Datendefizit", "Lagegenauigkeit" and "HÃ¶hengenauigkeit" to rubric "DatenqualitÃ¤t", delete DQ tables "Datendefizit" and "Absolute Positionsgenauigkeit". Also in Portal display of IDF.
IGE: Changed behaviour and positions of controls and rubrics. Behaviour set via JavaScript in Profile.

IGE: "Conformity - Specification of Conformity" is now ComboBox with new syslist, free entries can be transfered in Catalogue management. Syslist contains now metadata in syslist entries not shown in IGE but mapped in IDF (publish date at end of syslist entry).
IGE: "Availability - Usage Limitations" changed from table to textarea with separate dialog for selection from new syslist. Free entries can be transfered in Catalogue management.
Full Removal of field "environmental categories" from all IGE and portal backend STRUCTURES !!! (catalog, portal database ...).
Remove registry signs for PortalU.
Update styles and resource files to display sitemap and chronicle portlet for all profiles correctly.
Portal detail view: Map (IDF) and render correct GetCapabilities link in detail view and change style of rendering.
Fix password forgotten functionality for user with '.' in login id. Add check for invalid login IDs.
Fix handling of wrong requests, e.g. when requesting old portlet actions. Causes now error response without exception logging.
IGE: If no default language set in language syslist then use catalog language. Fixes import error when no default language set.
IGE: Read GetCapabilities now in UTF-8 format to read special UTF-8 characters.
IGE: Fix user management as mdAdministrator, couldn't create any users (mdAuthors).
IGE: Fix display of context sensitive help of additional fields (defined in profile) on IE. Also fix help when different browser language (not "de" or "en").
IGE: Fix comments dialog in IE.
IGE: Fix input of 0 number values (not interpreted as "false" anymore).
IGE: Fix help of "Basisdaten" and missing/wrong help from 3.0.1
IGE: Transforming of coordinates, show now error from service when coordinate transformation service fails.
IGE: Fix display of "from-object-references" which were deleted in working version but still exist in published version, now displayed again with color gray !
IGE: Fix export via export criteria and display of progress bar.
IGE: Fix address compare view ("Show Changes"). Further make object/address detail/compare view more robust (e.g. handling empty fields).
IGE: Fix address print/detail view on IE7.
Portal is now more robust in Admin iPlugs/iBus when iPlugs are configured falsely (missing props in PD).
Fix display error pages without styles in IE7.
Logged in users have now per default same start page as anonymous users (newest resources\sql\*.sql have to be applied).
Fix display of SVN version of InGrid sub-projects (apps, base, mdek) at "About PortalU" logged as portal admin.
GS Soil: Extend languages in serialized codelists for Metadata Language / Dataset Language and fix display in detail view if chosen language is different than en/de (ingrid-utils).
Fix thesaurus tree bugs. Add missing search field to query for search terms in English and fix reloading of thesaurus tree.
Add velocity macro to PortalU profile to show correct PortalU profile by switching profiles.
Fix provider table error for substring blanks at URL links.
Fix detail view bugs. Remove hit information like environment topics and support HTML tags on hit description.
Do not display links to capabilities url and show maps link in detail view if the URL was empty.
Update NUMIS profile to InGrid 3.1.0. (Adaptation of layout)
FIX Error when installing portal with database from scratch !!! Import missing sql scripts "update_3.0.1_mysql.sql", "update_3.1.0_mysql.sql" !
Remove field "environmental categories" from IGE and portal, selection now only via "environmental topics" (menue "topics").

Short virtual paths. The portal is now reachable from the root, so no ingrid-portal context is needed anymore. Attention: Please update the files https.conf and sites-enables/default to ensure the correct redirection of the paths!
For each page a title, description and keywords were added.
Most links received a tooltip now, which gives more explanation, where the links leads to.
A Google-Sitemap was added.
A 404- and 503 error page was added.
Renaming of words "Umweltchronik"->"Chronik", "Umweltthemen"->"Themen" and "Datenkataloge"->"Kataloge". The latter one also was moved from the search sub menu to its own main menu item.
Introduction of a feature page, which explains all the search functions.
General mayor changes in layout and design.
Exchanged commons-logging with slf4j library, which fixes a class loader exception when accessing another webapp which also uses commons-logging (jetspeed!).
IGE: Removing of double scrollbars in some tables.
IGE: Ref1Scale table checks inputs for correkt numbers now.
IGE: Changing of a tooltip.
Added support for CSW 2.0.2 in job monitor.
IGE: Several small fixes including date boxes in tables fixed month switch, button fix for thesaurus search, fixed inconsistency when adding a new entry for additional select field.
Update detail view styles for NUMIS.
Update ORACLE support (mdek SQL scripts, jdbc driver, context files).
Update detail view styles for HMDK Hamburg.
Update detail view styles for PortalUSachsen.

IGE: Various fixes (additional text area not possible to make it required, prevent creation of additional field ids with spaces, fix when cat admin user was changed, fixed label size of additional fields, prevent null pointer exception when an address has no email value).
Added support for login-restricted update-server (set username and password in ingrid-portal-apps.properties).
Always search English topic terms with the thesaurus browser (property thesaurus.search.add.en.term in ingrid-portal-apps.properties, enabled in GS Soil profile).
IGE: Allow multiple spatial systems ("Raumbezugssystem"), now 1:n association (also updated in Portal Detail-view of result).
IGE: On CSW import error in preparation phase, do not offer to import data while showing the error.
IGE: Fix display when switching languages.
IGE: Fix new operation in operation dialog.
IGE: Fix behaviour of cursor keys within tables.
IGE: Fix url replace function in catalog management.
IGE: Fix caching of additional fields and caching of localization.
IGE: Find user when typing username.
IGE: Do not show user management for meta authors.
Portal: Fixed handling of URLs as IDs of objects.
Portal: Show delivery point label only by post box at portal detail view page.
Portal: Add nodes useconstraints and accessconstraints to "Access restrictions" and "Usage restrictions" at portal detail view page.
Portal: Add portal POM version and SVN revision number to manifest file and show information at page "About PortalU" as user admin.
Portal: Fix group hits length for unranked hits.
Portal: Update dojo sources for detail view.
Portal: Add weather portlet for DWD Application.
IGE: Fix mapping of CSW vertical reference system to IGE Import format.
IGE: Fix mapping of CSW ReferenceSystem to IGE Import format, now handled for all classes (now part of "spatial-domain" in import format 3.0.1 ).
IGE: Updated help file with examples for IDF-mapping and Javascripting for additional fields.
Portal: Update IDF detail view for additional legacy fields to default tabs ("General", "Reference",...) by id.
Portal: Update GS Soil profile for Thesaurus-Browser, CMS-Items, Localisation, images, hiding of newsletter content, adjust of the GS Soil layout.
Portal: Update login view for IGE. Remove dashboard for IGE-users.
Portal: Update localization resources for PortalU.
Portal: Update help messages resources and images for PortalU.
Portal: Update print view (CSS) for printing all information of a detail view .
Portal: Add datatype "dsc_csw" to search catalog thesaurus result.
Portal: Update dojo project to version 1.6.0 (using for new dojo tabs in detail view).
Portal: Allow to show XHTML data in detail view.
Portal: Show Detaildata based on IDF (InGrid Detaildata Format).
Portal: Update cms item content for page "contact" at profile PortalU.
IGE: "Zeichensatz des Datensatzes" only mandatory in class 1 and only shown in classes 1,2,5
Add Parameter selenium for executing selenium tests.
Portal: Update German info box content for PortalU.

release.description: Release InGrid 2.3.1, NEEDS UPDATE OF IGC schema (2.3.1.1), IGE iPlug 2.3.1, ...
release.action: Portal: Update German info box content for PortalU and if title for link-URL is not set then hide link (incl. link icon) in info box.
Portal: Add css styles for NUMIS to display buttons correctly (without border).
Portal: Add Piwik functionality for profile NUMIS.
Portal: Update InGrid detail view: adaptation of print preview.
IGE: Importing of ISO datasets with hierarchyLevel "application" will be ignored.
IGE: A problem with UUID generation for addresses has been fixed. (ISO address-identifier detection was broken)
Portal: Update NUMIS profile (help messages, profile properties and ingrid-portal-apps properties) and add specific files to NUMIS profile (WMS properties, quartz_job.xml).
Portal: Improve wms url detection in search result view and detail view
Portal: Add new detail view with tab constructur.
IGE: Fix detail view and compare view of record when data is missing in tables.
IGE: Input "INSPIRE-Theme" now only mandatory in class 1 ("Geo-Information/Karte").
IGE: Input "Spatial System" now only mandatory in class 1 ("Geo-Information/Karte") and 3 ("Geodatendienst").
IGE: Add new permission "write-subnode" for creating direct subnode and then nodes underneath created subnode (IGC Schema 2.3.1.1).
IGE: User can be assigned to more than one group (IGC Schema 2.3.1.1).
Portal: Fix logo in detail view of HH Profile.
IGE: Fix check of INSPIRE fields when publishing. Now only relevant in classes 1 ("Geo-Information/Karte") and 3 ("Geodatendienst").
Portal: Fix display of catalogs in catalog browser.
Portal: Fix piwik and JavaScript detection.

release.description: Release InGrid 2.3 static changes (Portal version adapted to InGrid version). NEEDS UPDATE OF IGC schema (2.3.0) + IGE iPlug (2.3.0)
release.action: InGrid 2.3: The functionality "replace address" in the administration is extended, so that not only addresses of type 'point of contact' will be replaced. Instead all address types are taken into account when exchanging one address with another.

ISO addresses with organization and individual address will be imported as two addresses. The organization is imported as parent of the individual address. The name of the organization will be used for the address records identification and data.
InGrid 2.3: Introduce input of INSPIRE Encoding (data format) (IGC Schema 2.3.0).
InGrid 2.3: Introduce input of Data Quality in "Geoinformation/Karte" (IGC Schema 2.3.0).
Fix problem: spatial references were not displayed on detail view in portal.

Update admin user management: Admin can change password of user without enter old password, add property to define number of rows in a table view, add to user table view column "last login" for display the last login date of a user (User "guest" is not displaying now.).
Fix portal login with tomcat 6.
Update DB connection parameter to prevent connection loss after a long period of inactivity.
InGrid 2.3: Split object class "Dienst/Anwendung/Informationssystem" into classes "Geodatendienst" and "Informationssystem/Dienst/Anwendung" (IGC Schema 1.0.9).
InGrid 2.3: Split access - and user-constraints in IGE, Portal detail view etc. (IGC Schema 1.0.8)
ÃberprÃ¼fung KompatibilitÃ¤t von "IGE- Frontend" / "IGE-iPlug" / "IGC Datenbank". KompatibilitÃ¤tsprobleme werden im Frontend dargestellt (in den IGE Einstiegsseiten).
Better logging/display of Exceptions from IGE Backend.
Fixed service-type and service-classification in import/export format (was interchanged).
Do not display inactive indexer iPlugs in Portals iPlug-Admin-Gui.

Ãnderung der Funktion openNodesUntilHierarchyLevel um den Parameter Root-Node, um beim automatischen Ãffnen eines Node untergeordente Nodes eindeutige Node-IDs zu vergeben. Die Funktion getNextId() kann nur auf Bezug zum Root-Node verwendet werden, da diese die Node-ID alles Nodes verwaltet.
Disable xml validation of quartz job description, works now when offline.
Fix regression bug: could not save provider.
Add timeout for URLConnection that reads a RSS feed (should fix deadlock of RSS).
Fix logging of tomcat and webapps (commons-logging into common/lib and log4j into webapps).
Fix "Zeige Punktkoordinaten" for different coordinate systems.
NUMIS: Finalization of "NUMIS" Profil
Add search function with using text field for service and measures.
IGE Import: Import of ZIP/GZIP files.
IGE Import: Show mapping protocol before import of CSW or ArcGIS data format.
IGE Import: Move import status information to the top.
GSSoil: add french localization
Finalization of "NUMIS" Profil
Update PortalU help messages.
Remove Bulletpoints in info portlets.
Localization: Fix encoding of Java resource bundles (ISO-8859-15)
Secure File Handling (upload / download)
USE ALL NEWEST DEPENDENCIES including communication for reconnecting with iBus on iBus shutdown / startup.
Keep portal locale in session during login and logout.
Portal: detect new iPlug-SE Indexer plugins (2.0.0) in iPlug administration
IGE: ISO Import, do not import links without linkage URLs.
Add csv export for all monitors/jobs.
Reduce memory footprint for portal requests.
Prevent too large pages in thesarus navigator: Close other top tree nodes when opening a node, prevent duplicate nodes in path.
Localization: Default Resources are now in english. Separated differences in Profiles now in new ProfileResources_xx.properties.
Include newest communication fixing reconnection with iBus.
IGE: Fix ISO Import, do not import addresses with empty role.
Fixing error output in velocity templates.
Neues Profil "NUMIS"
Neues Profil "LGV Hamburg"
IGE: Beim Import von CSW Daten (Adressen) wird nun zwischen Organisation und Personen unterschieden.
Portal: Fix Link zur Detailanzeige bei in der Marginalspalte angezeigten CSW-DSC iPlug Treffern
Portal: Suche nach IGC Objekten in "Umweltthemen" funktioniert jetzt
Erweiterte Suche / FachwÃ¶rterbuch: Gleichlautende FachwÃ¶rter zum Suchbegriff werden nicht mehr gefiltert
Logging im mitgelieferten Tomcat jetzt per log4j in /common/classes/log4j.properties
Portal: Detaildaten des Tamino-iPlugs werden jetzt in generischer Darstellung angezeigt. Das iPlug wird nicht mehr als UDK5 DSC iPlug erkannt.
IGE: SNS-FunktionalitÃ¤t jetzt hinter Thesaurus-/Gazetteer-/FullClassifyService API gekapselt und per Spring injizierbar (GS Soil). In Portal "SNS" Aufrufe jetzt immer sprachbezogen !
Tracking Site Access via Piwik request in footer of pages (only PortalU, GS Soil)
IGE: Import von CSW ISO Daten und ArcGis Exportdaten in den IGE
"Korrupte" Datenkataloge in Katalogbrowser (Suche / Datenkataloge) ausschlieÃen
Lokalisierung von Administration UntermenÃ¼s
Layout CSS korrigiert, springt bei Rollover nicht mehr.
Neues Profil "GS Soil"
IGE: Importer schreibt detailliertere Messages in Import Protokoll (z.B. bei fehlerhaftem ArcGis Import)
IGE: Institutionen von Adressen in Objekten in der Druckvorschau korrekt darstellen
Erweiterung der Sprachauswahl im Portal unter Verwendung einer Auswahlliste
Sortierung der Such-/Verweisliste in der Druckansicht (IGE) und Portaldetailansicht
HinzufÃ¼gung der Eingabe eines Sicherheitscode (jCaptcha) in der Kontaktanfrage (jCaptcha Image bleibt bei falscher Eingabe erhalten)
Feste URL zu einem konkreten Kartenausschnitt
